lead_paragraph: In a story Aug. 13 about NBC's coverage of the Olympics, The Associated Press, relying on information provided by a publicist, reported erroneously that the online subscription content service Fullscreen made a 10-episode sports docuseries, "Keeping Score," on the U.S. women's soccer team. The series is only six episodes.
